l01_desc: AshAxiom allows building infinite computation pipelines. Each method returns the 'self' object.
l02_desc: The start() method automatically detects lists and applies operations to all elements simultaneously.
l03_desc: Use .precision() to round numeric output within the Expert Explorer UI.
l04_desc: Working with Pi and E. AshAxiom maintains high precision during complex calculations.
l05_desc: Save results to JSON and Excel formats directly at the end of your command chain.
cmt_l01: Initialize system and start a computation chain
cmt_l02: Execute operations on a collection of data
cmt_l03: Set numeric output precision for Explorer UI
cmt_l04: Precision control for irrational numbers (Pi, E)
cmt_l05: Export data to universal JSON and Excel structures
